# raxR

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of raxR is to provide a minimal package to facilitate objective read-across predictions using the GenRA approach.

## Installation

You can install the development version of raxR from [GitHub](https://github.com/patlewig/raxR) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("patlewig/raxR")
```
